segments.text: It is quite important to be a good listener in the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listening carefully can show you understand and respect the speaker .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It can show your good attainment as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Besides , you can pick up some helpful information from the talk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First of all , you should keep proper posture and make eye contact with the speaker with a smile .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To show that you have understood what is said , you can nod or ask simple questions at the right time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And your statement should be clear and brief to the point .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never should you interrupt on a unfamiliar topic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , in order not to leave a bad impression on the interviewer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Additionally , don't show any impatience to a repeated topic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be absent-minded even when you are not interested in the talk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In a word , any impolite behavior should be avoided in the listening .
segments.speaker: S2
